meta.description: Optimize the production of chocolate and peanut butter crepes to minimize crepe mix usage.

params.name: chocolate_spread_requirement
params.description: Units of chocolate spread required per crepe

params.name: peanut_butter_spread_requirement
params.description: Units of peanut butter spread required per crepe

params.name: crepe_mix_requirement
params.description: Units of crepe mix required per crepe

params.name: available_chocolate_spread
params.description: Total available units of chocolate spread

params.name: available_peanut_butter_spread
params.description: Total available units of peanut butter spread

objective.name: min_total_crepe_mix
objective.description: Minimize the total amount of crepe mix used

constraints.name: peanut_butter_spread_limit
constraints.description: Limit on peanut butter spread usage

constraints.name: peanut_butter_more_than_chocolate
constraints.description: Peanut butter crepes must exceed chocolate crepes

constraints.name: at_least_25_percent_chocolate
constraints.description: At least 25% of crepes must be chocolate
